alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 5:02AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northwestern Trumbull...Geauga...Cuyahoga...southern Lake and Ashtabula Counties Until 600 AM EST.... At 502 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Lorain to Chesterland, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Snow rates up to 2 inches per hour... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Chardon, Parma, Lakewood, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Westlake, Solon, Willoughby, Warrensville Heights, South Russell, Middlefield, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Burton, Highland Hills, West Farmington, Chesterland, North Olmsted, and Garfield Heights. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 303, 304, 306, 307, 308, 309, 310, 311, 312, 313, 317, 318, 319, 320, 322, 323, 324, 328, and 329.
